name: Social Login Buttons
description: The Social Login Buttons component is designed for quick user login.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to disable the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This is the handler to disable the component.

properties.name: redirectToPage
properties.label: Redirect To Page
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify which page to go to after login.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify which page to go to after login.

properties.name: extraQueryParams
properties.label: Extra Query Params
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to add extra query parameters that will be added to the URL address.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add extra query parameters that will be added to the URL address.

properties.name: callbackUrlDomain
properties.label: Callback URL Domain
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add a callback URL Domain.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to add a callback URL Domain.

properties.name: iconsVisibility
properties.label: Icons Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to control the visibility of the button icon.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the visibility of the button icon.

properties.name: googleplus
properties.label: Google Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the visibility of the Google button.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to control the visibility of the Google button.

properties.name: facebook
properties.label: Facebook Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to control the visibility of the Facebook button.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the visibility of the Facebook button.

properties.name: twitter
properties.label: Twitter Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the visibility of the Twitter button.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to control the visibility of the Twitter button.

properties.name: linkedin
properties.label: Linkedin Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the visibility of the Linkedin button.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to control the visibility of the Linkedin button.

properties.name: github
properties.label: Github Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the visibility of the Github button.
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to control the visibility of the Github button.
